title: Sample Book, "The Select Wall Papers", 1910–15
medium: Machine-printed, block printed, intaglio printed, embossed
description: a) Japanese leather papers, including leather and burlap designs; b) many tone on tone designs, matching block printed borders, intaglio printed childrens paper; c) contains small pieces of beautiful landscape borders, many tone on tone stripes and patterns, moire, fabric swatches; d) small-scale patterns, stripes with narrow block printed borders; e) contains many German and English papers, many tone on tone designs, floral stripes, simulated fabrics and moire patterns, intaglio printed sanitary papers; f) contains machine and block printed papers by Desfosse & Karth, black and white illustrations sowing full repeats, scenic papers; g) small-scale patterns, stripes, floral, diaper, linen fabric swatches by Desfosse & Karth; h) mostly small-scale floral designs, some tapestry papers.
